title: Riverdance: the new show
creator_credit: John McColgan, Moya Doherty, Abhann Productions and Tyrone Productions
brief_description: Filmed at Radio City Music Hall, the Irish dance company Riverdance has won acclaim since they entered the Eurovision Song Contest. This program features their new show which toured Australia in 1996. Highlights of the show include “Homecoming”, “Trading Taps” and their classics “Riverdance”, “Thunderstorm” and “Heartland.” Starring principal dancers Jean Butler, Colin Dunne and Maria Pages.
